page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO OUR AREA...
page.content: Our block is part of the district of Richmondshire in the county of North Yorkshire. The area we studied is very much a rural area,there are only two small settlements;Kirby Hill and Washton,and a few isolated farms and houses.Most of the land is above 250 Metres,much of the south and west of our block being moorland and used for rough grazing. Farming is the principal economic activty of this area, in the past few years there has been a shift to arable farming where the land is suitable. Most of the land is used for grazing sheep and cattle. There are sizeable areas of private woodland in our block.Much of the west of our area is used by the Army.
